targets.query: SELECT "build_number", "org_name", "service_name", "branch_name", "build_result_ordinal", "build_time", "tests_total" FROM "jenkins_data" WHERE $timeFilter AND "jenkins_host" =~ /^$jenkins_host$/ AND build_result <> '?' AND branch_name !~ /.*-release-\d.*/ ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT "deploy_status_devcicd_ordinal" FROM "jenkins_custom_data" WHERE $timeFilter AND "jenkins_host" =~ /^$jenkins_host$/ ORDER BY time DESC

panels.description: Total builds in the selected time filter.
panels.title: Total builds

panels.description: Only successful builds are used to calculate the average build duration

targets.query: SELECT mean("build_time") AS "Duration" FROM "jenkins_data" WHERE ("build_result" = 'SUCCESS' AND "project_path" =~ /.*\/dev$/ AND "jenkins_host" =~ /^$jenkins_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "project_path"

panels.title: Average build duration per service (DEV branch only)

panels.description: How often an organization successfully releases to prod
panels.title: Deployment Frequency

panels.description: Uniques branches built in the selected time filter.

targets.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "project_path") AS "Path" FROM "jenkins_data" WHERE $timeFilter AND "jenkins_host" =~ /^$jenkins_host$/

panels.title: Uniques branches built

targets.query: SELECT last("lines_of_code") FROM "sonarqube_data" WHERE ("jenkins_host" =~ /^$jenkins_host$/ AND "project_path" =~ /.*\/(dev|develop)$/) AND time <= now() GROUP BY "project_path"
SELECT last("vulnerabilities") FROM "sonarqube_data" WHERE ("jenkins_host" =~ /^$jenkins_host$/ AND "project_path" =~ /.*\/(dev|develop)$/) AND time <= now() GROUP BY "project_path"
SELECT last("bugs") FROM "sonarqube_data" WHERE ("jenkins_host" =~ /^$jenkins_host$/ AND "project_path" =~ /.*\/(dev|develop)$/) AND time <= now() GROUP BY "project_path"
SELECT last("code_smells") FROM "sonarqube_data" WHERE ("jenkins_host" =~ /^$jenkins_host$/ AND "project_path" =~ /.*\/(dev|develop)$/) AND time <= now() GROUP BY "project_path"
SELECT last("critical_issues") FROM "sonarqube_data" WHERE ("jenkins_host" =~ /^$jenkins_host$/ AND "project_path" =~ /.*\/(dev|develop)$/) AND time <= now() GROUP BY "project_path"

SELECT last("code_smells") as "code_smells_now", last("vulnerabilities") as "vulnerabilities_now", last("bugs") as "bugs_now", last("critical_issues") as "critical_issues_now" FROM "sonarqube_data" WHERE ("jenkins_host" =~ /^$jenkins_host$/ AND "project_path" =~ /.*\/(dev|develop)$/) AND time <= now() GROUP BY "project_path"

SELECT last("code_smells") as "code_smells_previous", last("vulnerabilities") as "vulnerabilities_previous", last("bugs") as "bugs_previous", last("critical_issues") as "critical_issues_previous" FROM "sonarqube_data" WHERE ("jenkins_host" =~ /^$jenkins_host$/ AND "project_path" =~ /.*\/(dev|develop)$/) AND time <= now() - $diff_interval GROUP BY "project_path"

SELECT last("code_smells") as "code_smells_now", last("vulnerabilities") as "vulnerabilities_now", last("bugs") as "bugs_now", last("critical_issues") as "critical_issues_now" FROM "sonarqube_data" WHERE ("jenkins_host" =~ /^$jenkins_host$/ AND "project_path" =~ /.*\/(dev|develop)$/) AND time <= now() GROUP BY "project_path"

SELECT last("code_smells") as "code_smells_previous", last("vulnerabilities") as "vulnerabilities_previous", last("bugs") as "bugs_previous", last("critical_issues") as "critical_issues_previous" FROM "sonarqube_data" WHERE ("jenkins_host" =~ /^$jenkins_host$/ AND "project_path" =~ /.*\/(dev|develop)$/) AND time <= now() - $diff_interval GROUP BY "project_path"

list.label: Jenkins
list.name: jenkins_host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jenkins_data" WITH KEY = "jenkins_host"
